name: Morph! A local Multiplayer Game
description:
Morph! Is a party game for 2-4 Players. The main idea is to have a turn-based Hide 'n Seek. After you select your player count/ nicknames and Game Settings, you will all spawn in a Map as a Player. Use F  to shoot, E to Morph into to selected object and Q to morph back to the player form.

Morph Options: Big Cactus (2 Forms), Small Cactus (2 Forms), Flower (4 Colors).

You can define a bullet count when you start the game. Those are the Bullets every player will be able to shoot before they run out of ammo. The bullets won't refill in the game!! So you gotta use them carefully :D After the Turn Time is over, the current player should hand over the Keyboard to the next player. Its thought so that the others aren't looking when they are inactive.
Its just a little thing i built while i was bored, so basically 4 days. Like a game jam for myself to challenge me :P

Anyways, have fun!
